item.description:
Hi All,

This is a 5 mile race which is easy to get to by T... and it's a bargain too at only $20!

http://www.jimkanesug...

It's at Boston College High School near the UMASS/ JFK MBTA Station (Across from the Boston Globe)

If you register too then please mark a yes on here and hopefully we can meet there before or after the race.

Take care, Martin

p.s. you're responsible for your own registration fees, safety etc. etc.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Organized Race - Sugar Bowl 5 Miler in South Boston
